actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Passed Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of April 17 to April 23, 1983, as "National Coin Week".

summary.text: Requests the President to designate the week of April 17 through April 23, 1983, as National Coin Week.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of April 17 to April 23, 1983, as "National Coin Week".
